sentence.Network_en: He began his career handling Soviet counterespionage for the FBI, until Hoover sacked him for drunkenness.
sentence.Network_cn: 他以在联邦调查局处理对苏反谍工作而开始他的职业生涯, 直到后来由于酗酒而被胡佛解职.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 间谍-的英语翻译-bab.la词典 ... 双重间谍 double agent 反间谍(活动) counterespionage 当间谍 to spy.

entry.def: Counter-espionage is the same as counter-intel-ligence .

auth_sentence.content: He received the usual battery of training in surveillance, counterespionage and the art of building sources.
auth_sentence.res_content: He received the usual battery of training in surveillance, counterespionage and the art of building sources.
